translations.translation: Public Cloud instances (virtual servers) combine flexibility and guaranteed resources.
In under a minute, you get CPU, RAM, dedicated storage and root access as with a dedicated server.
Public Cloud is either billed hourly or monthly so you can easily handle your costs.
Connect your physical servers and virtual servers within the same private network
Geolocated IPs which you can switch between OVH machines
Each Public Cloud instance has a public IPv4 and a public IPv6 by default
Resize your instance according to your needs
Cold storage for the best price, via the standard protocols
Back up and duplicate your instances in one click
Each instance has professional range high-performance SSD storage
Hot add high-availability, triple replicated storage
from a few gigabytes to several terabytes, store your objects on our SWIFT OpenStack platform
Automate your infrastructure management using OVH's API and OpenStack
One project and one container which will enable you to manage your Cloud instances
You can rename your project later.
You have not selected a default payment method.
This payment method will be used for any cloud services.
You can manage payment methods in the Billing section

Then, when you get an invoice, it will be automatically settled in the following order. First using the cloud credit assigned to this project, then using your accounts, and then finally using your prepaid OVH account (the debt must be settled immediately via any method of payment).
Public Cloud credit may not be transferred or reimbursed. It has no monetary value and any credit not used within 13 months will be lost.
Settle an initial invoice for {{price}} of cloud credit for this project.
